info.name: mcshare
info.description: This is an API management for customer transaction

request.description:
1.	Implement an API to upload and validate the provided XML file and store it in a database.
This endpoint is used to upload XML , validate the xml , create the customers and store the file in the database
2.	Validating the following fields as per rule 
a.	For individuals, customer must be at least 18 years old (system date – date of birth >= 18)
b.	Number of shares must be an integer and greater than 0 
c.	Share_Price must be a number greater than 0 up to two decimal places
4.	Storing valid records in tables in the database.

6.	Implement a query method to return the following:
a.	ID	
b.	Customer Name	
c.	Date Birth/Incorporated	
d.	Customer Type	
e.	Number of Shares	
f.	Share Price Per unit	
g.	Balance (Number of Shares * Share Price per unit)

5.	Implement a REST API to list all records as well as retrieve individual records.

localhost:8080/GetRecords/view?view=all OR localhost:8080/GetRecords/view?view=C11233 , where C11233 is the ID of the customer

8.	Implement a REST method to search on the Customer’s Name.
a.	The search should be on any part of the customer’s name.  E.g. if user inputs ‘ohn Do’, the search engine should be able to retrieve the record for customer with customer name ‘Mr John Doe’. Query should NOT be case sensitive.

e.g localhost:8080/GetRecordByName/name?name=ohn doe

9.	Implement a method to allow downloading of a subset of the data as CSV.

Download subset of customer data , can be done by searching name only
